name: HOLLY MENARD

jv_history.source_quote:
Holly Hartman’s Post

 Holly Hartman Co-Founder The

what_you_do: Holly Menard is a Life Mastery Consultant certified by the Brave Thinking Institute to teach and coach clients using a proven, reliable and repeatable system for creating success and living a life they love.
who_you_serve: She believes that we all deserve to live a life we love and these programs she's been trained to teach and coach produce amazing results.
social_proof: Certified by the Brave Thinking Institute
business_focus: Helping others who are struggling, feeling stuck, find meaning and purpose in their life after a devastating and profound loss of any kind at any point in time.
